statements: SELECT * FROM evidence
SELECT evidence_type, evidence_text FROM evidence ORDER BY date_added DESC
SELECT evidence_type FROM evidence WHERE lawyer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS evidence_count FROM evidence WHERE child_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM evidence WHERE evidence_type = 'Photo'
SELECT * FROM evidence WHERE evidence_type = 'Medical Report';
SELECT evidence_id, evidence_type, date_added FROM evidence WHERE date_added > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT evidence_type FROM evidence WHERE lawyer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT evidence_text FROM evidence WHERE child_id = '456e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND evidence_type = 'Photograph' LIMIT 3;
SELECT evidence_id, evidence_type, lawyer_id FROM evidence WHERE evidence_type LIKE '%%Report%%' AND date_added BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM evidence_text_messages;
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, timestamp FROM evidence_text_messages;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM evidence_text_messages WHERE sender_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM evidence_emails ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT subject, sender_email, receiver_email FROM evidence_emails WHERE receiver_email = 'bob@example.com';
SELECT message_text, sender_name, receiver_name FROM evidence_text_messages WHERE timestamp > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY sender_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM evidence_emails WHERE sender_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT sender_name, message_text FROM evidence_text_messages WHERE receiver_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_email, receiver_email, subject FROM evidence_emails WHERE timestamp <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY subject;
SELECT * FROM evidence_text_messages JOIN evidence_emails ON evidence_text_messages.sender_name = evidence_emails.sender_email ORDER BY evidence_text_messages.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM text_messages;
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, timestamp FROM text_messages WHERE receiver_name = 'Alice';
SELECT email_id, sender_email, receiver_email, subject FROM emails WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT child_name, start_date, end_date FROM child_custody_cases WHERE lawyer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT case_id, lawyer_name, notes FROM child_custody_cases ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM text_messages WHERE sender_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT message_content, timestamp FROM text_messages WHERE receiver_name = 'Alice Smith' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, message_content FROM text_messages ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE sender_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT subject, body, timestamp FROM emails WHERE receiver_email = 'jane@example.com';
SELECT * FROM text_messages WHERE sender = 'Alice';
SELECT sender, receiver, timestamp FROM emails WHERE receiver = 'Bob' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT document_title, category FROM evidence_documents WHERE category = 'Legal';
SELECT * FROM child_custody_case WHERE case_status = 'Closed' ORDER BY hearing_date ASC;
SELECT id, sender, receiver, timestamp FROM text_messages WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM text_messages WHERE sender='Alice';
SELECT sender, receiver, timestamp FROM text_messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, message_text FROM text_messages WHERE receiver='Bob' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE sender='Charlie' AND receiver='David';
SELECT subject, body FROM emails WHERE timestamp <= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM evidence_text_messages;
SELECT id, sender, receiver, message_text FROM evidence_text_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM lawyer_clients WHERE client_phone='123456789';
SELECT document_title, document_type FROM evidence_documents WHERE document_type='report';
SELECT email_subject, sender_email, receiver_email FROM evidence_emails WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM evidence_text_messages WHERE sender='Alice';
SELECT message_text, receiver FROM evidence_text_messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sender, receiver, timestamp FROM evidence_text_messages WHERE sender='Bob' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM lawyer_clients WHERE client_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM custody_cases INNER JOIN lawyer_clients ON custody_cases.client_id = lawyer_clients.client_id WHERE case_status='open';
